headline: Newswire
subtitle: Stalk and Save
content:
Social Club members can qualify for discounts at some Los Santos stores by stalking their pages on Lifeinvader.

Stalk Herr Kurtz barbers and then stop in to get your first cut free, stalk Los Santos Customs to get a complimentary paint job, or stalk and get a one-time discount at the Elitas Travel and Warstock Cache and Carry online stores - and more!

Visit www.lifeinvader.com on the (real world) web today.
